Text: I have it downloaded, can someone tell me what these files are (*.r01, *.r02, etc) and how to convert this to a movie?
never mind, figured it out.  Thanks anyway.

Hey 76Shovelhead, you need to download winrar. It will allow you to open the rar files. Once you've installed that program. The easiest way is to right click the your downloaded movie folder and click extract here. You'll then have an avi file.
